subject: Extortion and Blackmail
College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Louisville men’s coach Rick Pitino said he was the victim of an extortion attempt and had reported it to the F.B.I. The university said in a statement that Pitino reported the threats last month, and that the F.B.I. was investigating. Pitino said, “I am hopeful the media and public will recognize the slanderous nature of this direct and malicious attack.”.
